welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bad Camberg, Germany! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that it has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Air Base Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 24-hour limit per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
